QuestData.Title: The Codex of Blood
QuestData.Description: Two years ago the Shadow Council summoned forth a being that shattered Auchindoun in its wake.$B$BRead the Codex of Blood to find out what happened. Be warned, Grandmaster Vorpil guards it with his life.
QuestData.LogDescription: Read from the Codex of Blood in the Shadow Labyrinth of Auchindoun.
QuestData.RewardText: Opening the magically-suspended tome, a sense of dread overwhelms you.$B$BSomething is most definitely wrong here!
